description: Nedim Yasar was shot dead after attending the launch of a book about how he turned his back on crime.
title: Nedim Yasar: Two jailed for life for killing reformed Denmark gangster
title_page: Nedim Yasar: Two jailed for life for killing reformed Denmark gangster - BBC News
maintext: "Just over a year before he died, someone came to his door and tried to attack him with a knife. In his earlier days he would never have opened the door in the middle of the night without having a weapon in his hand. But when this happened he told me 'I'm just like you, I didn't suspect anything'. That told him and me quite a lot about his transition."
